pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, March 8, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of Sweden, Stefan Löfven.

11:25 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend Equal Voice’s Virtual Seating of Daughters of the Vote in the House of Commons, and deliver remarks.

The event begins as 9:40 a.m. and will be livestreamed via the following link: https://www.webcastlive.ca/dov-english/

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual discussion with representatives of SheEO Ventures. Minister of Small Business, Export Promotion and International Trade Mary Ng will also participate in the event.

Viewers can register to attend the virtual event via the following link: https://sheeo.world/sheeo-summit-2021/

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual event with a group of Girl Guides aged 7 to 11 from Vancouver, British Columbia.

Closed to media.
